translation: Description of the Birth of Pradyumna

gurmukhi: purK qRIAw AwnMd so bhu idn Bey ibqIq ] grB BXo qb rukmnI pRB qy prm punIq ]2015]
transliteration: Purakh Treeyaa Aanand So Bahu Din Bhae Biteet|| Gadbh Bhayo Tab Roukmaniprabh Te Param Pouneet||2015||
translation: The husband and wife passed many days in comfort and then Rukmani became pregnant.2015.

gurmukhi: aupjXo bwlk bIr nwm DrXo iqh prdumn ] mhwNrQI rn DIr sB jwnq hY jgq ijh ]2016]
transliteration: Oupjyo Baalak Beer Naam Ddaryo Tih Pardouman|| Mahaanrathiran Dheer Sabh Jaanat Hai Jagad Jih||2016||
translation: A heroic child named Pradyumna was born, whom the world know as a great warrior and conqueror of war.2016.

gurmukhi: ds idaus ko bwlk BXO jb hI qb sMbr dYq lY qwih gXo hY ] isMD ky BIqr fwr dXo iek m`C huqo iqh lIl lXo hY ]
transliteration: Das Dios Ko Baalak Bhyau Jab Hitab Sanbar Dait Lai Taah(i) Gado Hai|| Sindh Ke Bheetar Daar Dayo Ik Machchh Houto Tih Leel Layo Hai||
translation: When the child was only tan days of age, a demon named Shambar stole him and threw him in the sea, where he was swallowed by a fish;

gurmukhi: m`C soaU gih JIvir eyku su sMbr pY iPr cwie dXo hY ] B`Cn ko Puin qwih rsoie mY Byj dXo su aulws kXo hY ]2017]
transliteration: Machchh Sooo Gadh Jheevar(i) Ek(u) Su Sanbar Pai Phir Chaae Dayo Hai|| Bhachchhan Ko Phoun(i) Taah(i) Rasoe Mai Bhej Dayo Su Ulaas Kayo Hai||2017||
translation: A fisherman caught that fish and brought it to Shambar, who, getting pleased, sent it to the kitchen for cooking.2017.

gurmukhi: jb m`C ko pwrn pyt lgy qb suMdr bwrk eyk inhwrXo ] hoie dieAwl vqI su qRIAw krunw rsu pY icq mY iqn DwrXo ]
transliteration: Jab Machchh Ko Paaran Pet Lage Tab Soundar Baarak Ek Nihdaryo|| Hoe Daiaal Vatisu Treeyaa Karounaa Ras(u) Pai Chit Mai Tin Dhdaryo||
translation: When the belly of the fish was torn open, a beautiful child was seen there; the kitchen maid was filled with pity;

gurmukhi: qyro khXo piq hY iem nwrd sXwm Bny ieh Bwiq aucwrXo ] so bqIAw suin kY mun nwr BlI ibD soN Brqw kru pwrXo ]2018]
transliteration: Tero Kahyo Pati Hai Im Naarad Syaam Bhane Eh Bhaat(i) Ouchdaryo|| So Bateeaa Soun(i) Kai Mounndnaar Bhalibidh Son Bhartaa Kar(u) Pdaryo||2018||
translation: Narada came and said to her, “He is your husband;” and that women, considering his her husband, brought him up.2018.

gurmukhi: poKn bhuqu idvs jb krI ] qb ieh diRSt qRIAw kI DrI ] kwm Bwv icq BIqr chXo ] rukmn suq isau bc ieh khXo ]
transliteration: Pokhan Bahout(u) Divas Jab Daree|| Tab Eh Drisht Treeyaa Kiddaree|| Kaam Dhaav Chit Bheetar Chadyo|| Roukman Sout Sio Bach Eh Kahyo||2019||
translation: After being brought up for a good deal of time, he thought about a woman in his mind; the woman also, with sexual desire, said this to the son of Rukmani.2019.

gurmukhi: mYnvqI qb bYn sunwey ] qum mo piq rukmn ky jwey ] qum ko sMbr dwnv hirXo ] Awn isMD ky BIqr firXo ]2020]
transliteration: Mainvatitab Bain Sounaae|| Toum Mo Pati Roukman Ke Jaae|| Toum Ko Sanbar Daanav Hariyo|| Oon Sindh Ke Bheetar Dariyo||2020||
translation: Then Mainvati said this, “You are the son of Rukmani and also my husband; the demon Shambar had stolen you and thrown you into the sea.2020.
